data.name: Chess Club
data.description:
The greatest strategy game of all times! Select a stunning environment and challenge your friends, our AI, or one of the millions of Chess fans around the world.

* TIME FOR REMATCH UPDATE *
âš”ï¸ New Rematch System
ğŸ¤ Enable / Disable Microphone
ğŸ… Claim victory in 30 mins

 
 Key features
â™˜  Play against a friend or the AI
ğŸ™‚ Avatars and Voice IP
ğŸ† Casual and rated matches
ğŸ“œ Track your moves history
â²ï¸ Different time rules
â›°ï¸ 4 environments: Grand Palace, Stonehenge, Escher Dream and Masters Garden
âš”ï¸ Fight animations and sound FX
âœŒï¸  Both Hand tracking and Touch controllers are supported!
 
We keep working on frequent updates and will be adding new features as the game evolves.

Some of the most awaited functionalities are already in the pipeline: chess school, tournaments and even spectators so that you can join matches of pro players or cheer for your friends!

changelog.change_log:
CHESS CLUB 1.8.13 - TIME TO REMATCH + VOICE FIX - Jun 2023
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

â€¢ Rematch: when finishing a multiplayer game, just press on â€œRematchâ€ and wait for the opponent to accept! This was highly requested, and here it is!
â€¢ Improved the AI difficulty balancing
â€¢ We fixed the Voice Activation feature
â€¢ Added visual cues when you are transmiting voice.
â€¢ Now you can also mute yourself
â€¢ New and better hands model when using Hand-Tracking
â€¢ Claiming a deserted game is now possible after just 30 minutes
â€¢ New pop-up window when your opponent deserts in a ranked game for you to claim it after 30 mins
â€¢ Multiplayer stability improvements
â€¢ Voice chat error during multiplayer mode was fixed!!
â€¢ Some minor visual bug fixing
  â€¢ Visual overlapping removed
  â€¢ Text corrections & Labels
  â€¢ Render priorities
â€¢ Some more fixes & improvements, as usual

CHESS CLUB 1.8.11 - TIME TO REMATCH - May 2023
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

â€¢ Rematch: when finishing a multiplayer game, just press on â€œRematchâ€ and wait for the opponent to accept! This was highly requested, and here it is!
â€¢ Improved the AI difficulty balancing
â€¢ We fixed the Voice Activation feature
â€¢ Added visual cues when you are transmiting voice.
â€¢ Now you can also mute yourself
â€¢ New and better hands model when using Hand-Tracking
â€¢ Claiming a deserted game is now possible after just 30 minutes
â€¢ New pop-up window when your opponent deserts in a ranked game for you to claim it after 30 mins
â€¢ Multiplayer stability improvements
â€¢ Some minor visual bug fixing
  â€¢ Visual overlapping removed
  â€¢ Text corrections & Labels
  â€¢ Render priorities
â€¢ Some more fixes & improvements, as usual

KNOWN ISSUES: Due to some changes in the mic permissions functionality in the latest firmware versions of Meta, we are aware of a random error occurring in the voice chat during multiplayer mode, which causes users to have no access to voice. We are working to fix the issue and will release a patch ASAP

CHESS CLUB 1.6.09 - PARTY CHAT PATCH UPDATE - March 2023
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â€¢ Fixed THE "black screen of death" error when the players starts a multiplayer game while using Meta Party Chat.

Really, tracking down this error has driven us crazy. Many thanks again to our amazing community for help us to improve the game!!! Enjoy!!! ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°

CHESS CLUB 1.6.08 - MULTIPLAYER PATCH UPDATE - Feb 2023
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â€¢ Multiplayer mode is now much more stable: a full review of the multiplayer protocol was performed and the errors are now gone. 
â€¢ Fixed some textures on Grand Hotel
â€¢ Bug fixes

Many thanks to our amazing community for help us to improve the game!!! ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°

CHESS CLUB 1.6.07 - PARK & CLOCKS UPDATE - PATCH 4 - January 2022
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â€¢ A functional chess clock in every environment. It will match the style of each scenario, it looks cool and feels even better!
â€¢ A new natural environment: a peaceful park with lots of light and greens
â€¢ Enhanced Voice Activacion Commands (give them a try!)
â€¢ Credits added to the game, grab the block to see who did what!
â€¢ Some improvements:
    â€¢ Profile image
    â€¢ Better Draw & Claim winning behaviour
    â€¢ Environment preview icons on the UI
â€¢ Very minor bug fixes
â€¢ PATCH 1 - Fixed the board coordinates of new environment
â€¢ PATCH 2 - Fixed a blocking error when the player do not allowed the audio permission
â€¢ PATCH 3 - Fixed some Autoclock bug fixes
â€¢ PATCH 4 - Fixed some text issues

â€¢ Some improvements:

â€¢ Fixed a blocking error when the player do not allowed the audio permission

CHESS CLUB 1.5.04 - AVATARS & VOICE UPDATE - September 2022
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â€¢ Meta Avatars 2.0: The latest version of Meta Avatars is now available in Chess Club!
â€¢ New Set of Avatars: a set of pre-set avatar with face expressions that will put yourself in the shoes of the likes of a physics genius or a red-haired chess master.
â€¢ Voice Commands: navigate through menus, find a match and move your pieces just using voice commands!
â€¢ Death Dance: make the cemetery pieces dance by saying "Death Dance". Or don't, your choice.
â€¢ Bug fixes, of course

CHESS CLUB 1.4.27 - HANDS-ON EMOTION UPDATE - May 2022
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â€¢ You can now send emotions to your opponent: ok, like, dislike, love, it rocks! cool, hurry up & victory!
â€¢ You can use hand-tracking gestures or the game panel to send these emotions
â€¢ You can also play with the cemetery pieces freely: throw the pieces, play with them on the table, balance them on your hands, roll those pieces, and more!
â€¢ Some more fixes & improvements, as usual

CHESS CLUB 1.4.02 - HANDS-ON UPDATE - FEATURING HANDS 2.0 - April 2022
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â€¢ The game is now compatible with the brand new Hands 2.0 feature released with V39 Quest software, which provides much better hand tracking.
â€¢ Some bugs fixed

CHESS CLUB 1.4.00 - HANDS-ON UPDATE - April 2022
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â€¢ Improved Hand-Tracking system for a fully natural grip of the pieces
â€¢ It's now possible to pass one piece from one hand to the other, try it!
â€¢ Hands visuals have been enhanced
â€¢ Hands now have the real size of the player's hand when using Hand-Tracking mode
â€¢ You can now use gestures to:
  â—¦  Mute / Unmute music
  â—¦  Mute / Unmute opponent
  â—¦  Hide / Show opponent
â€¢ Multiplayer mode is now more stable
  â—¦ A full revamp of the protocol was performed
  â—¦ We've reinforce the behavior of the system when one of the players loses connection to the Internet or has an inestable network
  â—¦ We've added a reconnect screen when someone is taken out of the match due to any error
â€¢ We've added some nice details as well:
  â—¦ Now you can see two extra columns: "Claimable" and "Scoring"
  â—¦ Added the "Scoring" column to the History panel
  â—¦ Notifications now have sound alerts
  â—¦ Visual improvements in the main menu
  â—¦ Enhanced Matchmaking effect
  â—¦ Improvements on the menu buttons
â€¢ Various fixes & improvements

Chess Club 1.3.00 - Social & Language Update
----------------------------------------------------
â€¢ Added more ways to invite & join friends in matches from the Oculus app & store!
â€¢ Language support added for spanish, french, german, japanese and korean.
â€¢ We keep fine tuning all the processes, so no bugs around!

Chess Club 1.2.20 - Matchmaking patch
----------------------------------------------------
â€¢ Auto-match mechanism improved: now you can set "any" in your game preferences for a more flexible matchmaking.
â€¢ Polished some bugs here and there.

Chess 1.2.04 - Escher Dream Update
-------------------------------------------
â€¢ New environment: â€œEscher Dreamâ€
â€¢ New "Automatch" feature for a better matchmaking experience
â€¢ Addes some nice options during gameplay:
    â€¢ Mute music
    â€¢ Mute your opponent (audio and/or avatar)
    â€¢ Speed up Stonehenge animations
â€¢ New feature to "Claim match" when the opponent abandoned the match for over 48h
â€¢ Other good stuff:
    â€¢ On rated matches, side selection is randomized
    â€¢ Minor visual upgrades in some menus such as the list of matches or whether a match is claimable or not
â€¢ Gently polished some bugs here and there

v 1.1.00 - Kickoff update - July 2021
â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”
â€¢ Added shadows to the pieces in both stages
â€¢ New battle animations for the pawns
â€¢ UI Panels back-side improvements
â€¢ Polished & improved elements:
   â€¢ Start of multiplayer games
   â€¢ UI interactions in general
   â€¢ Invitations & notifications
   â€¢ Matchmaking & friends menus
â€¢ Performance improvements
â€¢ We played catch & seek with many bugs, and won by ckeckmate!
